name: Bar Brawl (FocusNIL, Spriter Theo)
description:
This is a short arcade beat 'em up made for the Indie Tales game jam. Try to get the high score beating up the most lizard banditos before getting knocked out.

CONTROLS:

Space = Jump

Arrows or W, A, S, D = Move

Left Click or Z = Punch

Right Click or X = Grab/Throw

Grab bottles and throw them or smash stools over your enemies to do extra damage.

Please excuse the lack of music, the piano player was thrown out a window. So was the piano. Our musical suggestions are "Maple Leaf Rag" and "Paradise Line".

CREDITS:

Theoden Swaby > Sprites/Level Design (Theoden's Page)

Scott Rose >Code/Misc.
